DOC.brief_summary: The aim prospective double blind randomise study investigate efficacy symbiotic preparation contains lactobacillus casei , L. rhamnosus , L. plantarum , Bifidobacterium lactis , fructo galactooligosaccharide cytokine interferon-gama act Th1 pathway , interleukin -5 act Th2 , interleukin -10 act T regulatory pathway , interleukin -17 act Th-17 pathway relate necrotizing enterocolitis pathogenesis low birth weight neonate .
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Neonates bear 26- 32 gestational week 750-1500 gram birth weight 2 . Neonates tolerate minimal enteral feeding within postnatal first week Exclusion criterion : 1 . PROM > 24 hour and/or chorioamnionitis 2 . Mechanic ventilation supply 7 day 3 . Culture proven sepsis 4 . Major congenital anomaly 5 . Patients undergo surgery Intervention : The allocation contain opaque , sequentially number sealed envelope . The study group receive symbiotic preparation ( Probiotic ATP , Nobel , 1/2 sachet twice daily ) ; whereas control group receive placebo ( distilled water ; 1 ml per dose twice daily ) add breast milk formula start first feed.0.5 cc blood sample take patient within postnatal 48 hour , 14+2.days , 28+2.days . This sample turn cold centrifugation store -20 Â°C temperature . The cytokine analyse ELISA multiplex method .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Neonates bear 26 32 gestational week 7501500 gram birth weight 2 . Neonates tolerate minimal enteral feeding first week life 1 . PROM > 24 hour and/or chorioamnionitis 2 . Mechanical ventilation supply 7 day 3 . Culture proven sepsis 4 . Major congenital anomaly 5 . Neonates undergo surgery
